install.name: Xmap plugin for Joomla Bible Study
install.author: Joomla Bible Study - Tom Fuller
install.description: Xmap plugin for Bible Study component.

field.name: t
field.description: Choose which display template to apply to the links
field.label: Display Template
field.query: SELECT id, title FROM #__bsms_templates WHERE published = 1 ORDER BY text ASC

field.name: order
field.description: Choose descending or ascending order for studies
field.label: Display order

field.name: displaytype
field.label: Type of List
field.description: Choose how you want the list displayed, by book, year, teacher, or location. Then it will break by year.

field.name: showmedia
field.label: Show Media Files
field.description: Include links to media files (direct links only will show)

field.name: limit
field.label: Study/Media File Limit
field.description: Number of studies and media files to include. Leave blank for all

field.name: expand
field.label: Expand studies
field.description: Yes allows expansion, no presents all rows

field.name: sitemap
field.label: Select Site Map
field.description: Select the Sitemap to use with this plugin
